content.rendered:
Play shell shockers Online : Unblocked & Free

Shell Shockers is the most popular egg-based first person shooter io game!

Take control of a heavily armed egg and battle real players across multiplayer maps in private or public arenas. One of the best free to play FPS io games comes to your mobile device for eggciting free-range action!

Shell Shockers Unblocked : Free to Play on Mobile and Web Browser

In Shell Shockers, you are armed with snipers, pistols, reggie, grenades, and many other things as you battle across many worlds to achieve supreme yolk. You need to fight with eggs.

Shell Shockers 2022 Trailer

Shell Shockers : Free to Play on Mobile and Web Browser

Gear up with eight different weapons: Crackshot, Scrambler, Tri-Hard, Whipper, Free Ranger, Cluck 9mm and Eggk47. Then customize your eggatar with crazy hats, skins, colors and decals before taking the fight to your opponents!

CHOOSE YOUR GAME

Play Shell Shockers Free-For-Alls to take on all comers, or join Team mode to battle red vs blue…

or try the zany Capture the Spatula mode, where you battle for possession of the amazing Spatula. Play on public servers around the world or create your own private game to play an eggciting shooting game with friends!

CROSS PLATFORM PLAY WITH WEB

Keep your account from the io web game and play cross-platform battles with your friends on desktop or laptop devices!

Shell Shockers is a multiplayer online FPS game with characters are eggs armed with guns.

You control one of these eggs in one of three online game modes: Teams, Free For All, Captula the Spatula using bullets and bombs to shatter your opponents.

  • Teams: Join a team (red or blue) and use your skills to battle in enemy eggs, ensuring that your team gets the most kills.
  • Free For All: Each egg will fight for itself. Like fighting games, shooting if you see an egg is only one winner in this mode.
  • Captula the Spatula: Two teams, red and blue, contest the spatula. Kills are worth points for the team with the spatula but will lose points when having the player is killed.

Have eight weapons types in Shell Shockers io. Each weapon has its feature and should be used in a different situation. You can see the list of Shell Shockers’ weapon:

  • EggK-47 (use in Soldier)
  • Dozen Gauge (use in Scrambler)
  • RPEGG (use in Eggsploder)
  • CSG-1 (use in Free Ranger)
  • SMEGG (use in Whipper)
  • M2DZ (use in Crackshot) TriHard
  • Cluck 9mm (Secondary pistol – Always have)
  • Grenade (Always have)

How to Play Shell Shockers

In Shell Shockers game, you must work hard to protect yourself and dish out damage to opposing eggs. Try out each game mode and see if you can conquer the Shell Shockers arena.

Jump into the game and select your character name, customize your egg, and choose one of four game modes.

Shell Shockers Tips and tricks

  • Play tactically
  • Act quickly
  • Collect egg ammunition
  • Think like an egg

What is Shellshock.io?

Shellshock.io Is an awesome game in the Shooting Games genre. On our website, you can play Shellshock.io in a browser free of charge.

Introduction to Shell Shockers Game

Shell Shockers is a game in which players must defend their city from waves of enemies while trying to shoot them with weapons like machine guns, rockets, and grenades.

The game makes it easy for new players to learn the ropes because it has an interface that’s user-friendly and its tutorial mode walks you through how to play. The game also offers a variety of features that make it interesting for experienced players.

You can customize your character in different ways, like changing the outfit or color of their clothes and weapons, or choosing the type of gun they use. Another feature is the ability to create new types of weapons using items found around the city. If you’re looking for an online multiplayer game that will have you hooked on every level, try this game today!

What Is The Best Way To Play This Game?

One of the best ways to play the game is to enlist the help of a teammate.

The more players you have on your team, the faster enemies are killed and the more points you earn. You can also play with friends. If you want to play with family or friends in real life, then playing online gives you that option too.

And if you’re not always looking for a game to play, then just turn off notifications during certain hours so you don’t get bombarded by invites from others who are.

This game mode is similar to the famous game mode ‘capture-the-flag’.

However, now the flags are swapped with golden spatulas. Steal the spatula of the opponents and return it to your own spatula.

This mode is also team-based. The spatula will be dropped upon death, pick it up to either recover it or to continue your fallen teammate’s journey!

What is shell shockers 2

Get ready for the war of the eggs! Are you ready for fun with Shell Shockers 2, Shell Shockers, one of the most played games of recent times, takes the entertainment to the peak with its new version.
